headline: New Clinical Study Data Showcase Long-Term, Sustained Benefits of Abbott's Volt™ PFA System for Patients with AFib
summary: Abbott (NYSE: ABT) has announced new data from its Volt CE Mark Study that show strong safety and efficacy out to 12 months for patients receiving pulsed field ablation (PFA) therapy with the Volt™ PFA System for the treatment of atrial fibrillation (AFib). The data also highlights the excellent safety profile of the Volt PFA System alongside the system's ability to achieve results with fewer therapy applications (just 4.7 applications per vein on average) than on-market competitive PFA systems.
